ddl_create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS oasisreport (schemalocation TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (schemalocation));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messageheader (version TEXT, timedate TEXT, source TEXT, oasisreport_schemalocation TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_schemalocation) REFERENCES oasisreport(schemalocation), PRIMARY KEY (version, timedate, source));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messagepayload (id TEXT, oasisreport_schemalocation TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_schemalocation) REFERENCES oasisreport(schemalocation), PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rto (name TEXT, messagepayload_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (messagepayload_id) REFERENCES messagepayload(id), PRIMARY KEY (name));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_item (id TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_header (sec_per_interval INTEGER, system TEXT, uom TEXT, interval TEXT, tz TEXT, mkt_type TEXT, report TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (sec_per_interval, system, uom, interval, tz, mkt_type, report));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_data (ramp_type TEXT, id TEXT, interval_start_gmt TEXT, mkt_type TEXT, segment_prc REAL, interval_end_gmt TEXT, data_item TEXT, segment_mw INTEGER, baa_grp_id TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (ramp_type, id, interval_start_gmt, mkt_type, segment_prc, interval_end_gmt, data_item, segment_mw, baa_grp_id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disclaimer_item (disclaimer TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (disclaimer));
